name: Algaenergy S.A
goal:
ALGAENERGY, founded in 2007, is a technology based company working in the biotechnology of microalgae sector.
Its main activities are focused on:

-IMPROVING the biological processes

-while REDUCING production costs

-so as to develop NEW PRODUCTS– innovative and competitive-

With the contribution of:

-a reliable and experienced management

-world leading shareholder in Energy and CO2 abatement; Iberdrola

-a scientific partner who is an international authority on the microalgae field; Miguel García Guerrero is the Scientific Director of AlgaEnergy, Ph.D. in Biology, University Professor, Member of the Royal Academy of Sciences (Seville). One of the few researchers in microalgae, holds several patents on biological & microalgae processes

-large investments in R&D and talent

The mission of AlgaEnergy is:

-To enhance the value of the substantial scientific and technological heritage of the main Spanish universities and research centers working on algal biotechnology.

-To develop acquired technology and generate its own, optimizing its operation.

-To maintain AlgaEnergy as a company of international reputation and as a power in the research, production and practical use of microalgae.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
We are interested in regulatory files, documents, trends and policies related to:

- H2020
- Climate change
- Bioenergy, particularly biofuels
- Novel Foods
- Aquaculture
- Agriculture
- Genetically modified organisms
- Funding instruments for European SMEs
